unnormalised: Arre bhai, these property disputes under civil law are never-ending dramas! My chacha's case has been going on since 2005 – still waiting for a judgement. Adv. Sharma keeps saying "next hearing, next hearing," and chacha keeps spending Rs. 5000 on chai and samosas for the lawyers. Seems like the only ones winning are the chaiwalas! Seriously though, hope he gets it resolved before 2030, or his grandkids will inherit the case instead of the land. LOL!
normalised: Arre bhai, these property disputes under civil law are never ending dramas! My chacha's case has been going on since two thousand and five – still waiting for a judgement. Advocate Sharma keeps saying "next hearing, next hearing," and chacha keeps spending rupee five thousand on chai and samosas for the lawyers. Seems like the only ones winning are the chaiwalas! Seriously though, hope he gets it resolved before two thousand and thirty, or his grandkids will inherit the case instead of the land. L-O-L!
